name: Udon Peanut Butter Noodles
author: Mojito Mama
summary: Udon noodles with a spicy Peanut sauce.
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons minced fresh ginger root
1 whole rotisserie chicken, skinned and boned, meat pulled into large chunks
directions: Bring a large pot with lightly salted water to a rolling boil
Drop the udon in a few noodles at a time and return to a boil
Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes
While the udon noodles are cooking, whisk the chicken broth, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, honey, chile oil, and garlic in a saucepan over medium-high heat
Bring to a boil, whisking until the peanut butter has melted
Pour the sauce over the noodles
Add the chicken and red bell pepper; toss until the noodles are evenly coated in the sauce
Sprinkle with green onions, chopped peanuts, and cilantro to serve
